snippet: The Polish director Andrzej Zulawski, director of almost hallucinogenic visions, is the focus of a BAMCinématek retrospective.
abstract: Polish director Andrzej Zulawski is the focus of a BAMcinematek retrospective; filmmaker's first American retrospective examines work, which is typically frenzied, with the feel of a hallucination.
lead_paragraph: The Polish director Andrzej Zulawski, director of almost hallucinogenic visions, is the focus of a BAMCinématek retrospective.

headline.seo: ‘Hysterical Excess,’ Andrzej Zulawski Films at BAMcinématek
headline.main: Food, Politics and Sex, Brought to a Boil
headline.print_headline: Food, Politics and Sex, Brought to a Boil
